author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

I casually stumbled on this module while looking at resource consumption in the HLT menu. I am wondering if we could make it a `global` module.  I profit of the PR to clean-up a bit the naming of variables and const correctness of data-members.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: make `AlcaPCCEventProducer` a global module
